roleset.note: NEGLECT-V NOTES: There's also a usage "neglect to X" (eg "John neglected to mention toMary that he hated her.") which might or might not fit into thisroleset, depending on your viewpoint. It doesn't occur in the corpus,though, so the point is somewhat moot. (from neglect.01-v)
NEGLECT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, WordNet, neglect-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls neglect-75-1-1. (from neglect.01-n)
